channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 高收益储蓄账户去年产生了大量利息，现在税单就要到期了。
item.description:
High-yielding savings accounts threw off tons of interest last year — now the tax bill is coming due. https://t.co/VdwDmuVRdj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Oaktree 联合创始人霍华德-马克斯（Howard Marks）认为，在金融危机和大流行病期间，政府为支持美国经济所做的努力已导致公共债务水平可能无法持续。
item.description:
Government efforts to support the US economy during the financial crisis and the pandemic have led to a level of public indebtedness that could prove unsustainable, according to Oaktree co-founder Howard Marks. https://t.co/qwZrtwHlRY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）将波音 Max 10 飞机从今年的飞行计划中撤出，今年将放慢飞行员招聘速度，并暂停新飞行员培训课程。
item.description:
United Airlines is slowing pilot hiring this year and suspending training classes for new aviators after pulling the Boeing Max 10 aircraft from its flight plans for this year. https://t.co/ke264Wg50E

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 试图收购埃弗顿俱乐部的投资经理被一名债权人起诉，该债权人希望阻止公司转让两家子公司
item.description:
The investment manager trying to buy Everton FC is being sued by a creditor who wants to stop the firm from transferring two subsidiaries https://t.co/oWztmei09h

item.title: 也门胡塞叛军控制也门西北部近十年。与哈马斯一样，他们也敌视以色列，并得到伊朗的支持。

Yemen’s Houthi rebels have controlled northwestern Yemen for nearly a decade. Like Hamas, they are hostile to Israel and backed by Iran. https://t.co/Msq7loNSVs

item.title: 委内瑞拉决定在 7 月举行大选，这在反对派中引起了轩然大波，现在他们只有不到三周的时间来寻找尼古拉斯-马杜罗的挑战者。
item.description:
Venezuela’s decision to hold elections in July sends shock waves through the opposition, which now has less than three weeks to find a challenger to Nicolás Maduro https://t.co/YFqY4p9i6s

item.title: 美国劳工统计局表示，该局没有 "超级用户 "名单，上周发给该群体的一封电子邮件涉及租金通胀的一个关键指标，是个错误
item.description:
The Bureau of Labor Statistics said it doesn’t keep a list of “super users,” and an email last week addressed to that group about a key measure of rental inflation was a mistake https://t.co/tgfgbXeK1w

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 彭博贸易追踪报告显示，面对持续的供应链中断，强劲的需求使全球货运出现了不太可能出现的反弹。
item.description:
Resilient demand has allowed global shipments to pull off an unlikely rebound in the face of continuing supply chain disruptions, according to the Bloomberg Trade Tracker https://t.co/WDwHb6y4nF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 如果从数据上看，拜登在总统任期内悄然取得了不错的成绩。问题是：这对特朗普来说重要吗？

item.title: @QatarEconForum 位于多哈，地理位置优越，充分利用了卡塔尔连接亚洲与非洲及其他地区的能力。申请参加第四届卡塔尔经济论坛： #منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي

item.title: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）说，他的前任雅各布-祖马（Jacob Zuma）支持的一个新政党的成员威胁说，如果该政党被排除在 5 月 29 日的选举之外，他们将被逮捕。
item.description:
South Africa’s President Cyril Ramaphosa said members of a new party backed by his predecessor Jacob Zuma who have threatened unrest if it is excluded from May 29 elections will be arrested. https://t.co/JNj4EqP0ez

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长洛雷塔-梅斯特（Loretta Mester）表示，央行应该能够在今年晚些时候开始降息，不过她首先希望看到更多证据表明通胀正在进一步降温。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Loretta Mester said that the central bank should be able to start cutting rates later this year, though she first wants to see more evidence that inflation is cooling further. https://t.co/eAkBDBxuvd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）反驳了定价激增将助长美国通胀的观点，称公司应该有制定价格的自由。
item.description:
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell pushed back on the idea that surge pricing will fuel US inflation, saying companies should have the freedom to set prices. https://t.co/lwk1oIjBmb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: 近期加密货币的反弹刺激了交易所 Coinbase 发行的债券的回升，该债券去年还处于不良交易区间。
item.description:
The recent rally in cryptocurrencies has spurred a recovery in a bond issued by the exchange firm Coinbase that had been trading in distressed territory as recently as last year. https://t.co/qBNLqpA14U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024

item.title: Iberdrola 出价约 25 亿美元收购其尚未持有的美国子公司 Avangrid 的全部股份，以扩大其在美国市场的业务范围。
item.description:
Iberdrola offered about $2.5 billion to buy all the shares it doesn’t already own in US subsidiary Avangrid as it looks to expand its footprint in the American market https://t.co/KUjENLO4FP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 7, 2024
